Html:
Hi,

I downloaded the quickgraph assemblies recently. I have to implement Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm for my project. Can you please tell me which assembly and namespace contains VertexPredecessorRecorderObserver method? I am not able to find this method.
I am using the 2.1.1441.30422 version. Also if I am referring to the wrong dlls then plz give me the correct link to the dlls.

Thanks
You can search for types in managed code assemblies using Reflector (http://www.aisto.com/roeder/dotnet/).
